page.title: 06HEATHCOTE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: Most noticeable on the {Heathcote {Industrial Estate}is the 'Books For Students' building which is most striking in colour and design.It is 50,000 sq.ft. in area and has taken one hundred workmen about 14 months to complete at a cost of Â£800,000.It is made with a steel framework and glass insulation boards. The firm started in Surrey and came to L.Spa ten years ago. Other firms include Henderson's (garage doors),Machsize Ltd (measure- ment and inspection technology),Axis Plant Hire and a number of light industrial firms.There are also a number of warehousing and storage facilities for companies. {Europa Way}was built to improve access to the site and more roads are being planned for the near future.
